Hey I Got It Working 100%....

1)Install The Game in C Drive..

2)Open Notepad n Paste Below Registry Code...

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\EA Core\Installed Games\hp_dhpt1_dd]
"lang"="en-uk"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Electronic Arts\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1]
"DisplayName"="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallowsâ„¢ - Part 1"
"Locale"="en_GB"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Electronic Arts\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1\ergc]
@="NZKTS6J3X1Y6S6T81911"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1]
"DisplayName"="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallowsâ„¢ - Part 1"
"CD Drive"="G:\\"
"ProductName"="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallowsâ„¢ - Part 1"
"Folder"="C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Electronic Arts\\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows(TM) - Part 1\\"
"Install Dir"="C:\\Games\\TPTB\\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows\\"
"Installed From"="G:\\"
"Locale"="en_UK"
"Language"="English (UK)"
"Product GUID"="{C9AAF970-4E7E-4C98-AD67-09C74379D345}"
"Suppression Exe"=""
"Registration"="Software\\Electronic Arts\\Electronic Arts\\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1\\ergc"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1\1.0]
"DisplayName"="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1"
"Language"=dword:00000013
"LanguageName"="English (UK)"
"ProgramGroup"="C:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start Menu\\Programs\\Electronic Arts\\"

4)Save It As 32bit fix.reg in location "C:\Games\TPTB\Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
"
Replace Existing Fix....

5)Then Open N Merge The Reg File......n Enjoy Playing..........

6)Thanx TPtb For Wonderful Game.....
